home.title: 1PACTUS Charts
home.description: Welcome to Pactus Charts. This website provides basic analysis of PACTUS on-chain data for your reference. The daily updated charts will be conducted after 00:10 UTC and will incorporate the on-chain behavior of the previous day into the analysis.
home.disclaimer-content: This website is not the official statistics platform of PACTUS, but a supplementary display of PACTUS on-chain data. This website is completely developed and maintained by community members. We cannot guarantee long-term maintenance and updates. We are not responsible for any issues arising from website maintenance interruptions. This website does not constitute investment advice. We do not guarantee the accuracy of any data or charts. No individual or organization recognizes this website. All data and charts may be manually corrected due to program errors or statistical policy issues.
